EmailTemplate.name: Honda Layout - Cancelled CBO - Part Reordered (For I/C)
EmailTemplate.subject: Cancelled CBO - Part Reordered (For I/C)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cancelled CBO - Part Reordered (For I/C)
[EN] Hello {!Contact.Name}, This e-mail is a notification to let you know that because we receive stock at the [ENTER PDC HERE] PDC of part [ENTER PART # HERE] that your dealer had on CBO for customer VIN {!Case.Subject_VIN_Serial__c}, we have cancelled the CBO in the system and reordered instead from [ENTER DETAILS HERE], Purolator Prepaid:
Reference #: [ENTER REFERENCE #] [FR] Bonjour {!Contact.Name}, Cet e-mail sert comme notification pour vous aviser que votre CBO sur la pièce no. [ENTER PART # HERE] pour le NIV {!VIN__c.ProductSerialNumber__c} fut annulé vu que nous avons reçu du stock à [ENTER PDC HERE] et avons ainsi recommandé la pièce de votre part, Puro prépayé de [ENTER DETAILS HERE]: No. de réf. [ENTER REFERENCE #]
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link: http://www.honda.ca/contact_us
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy (http://www.honda.ca/privacy).
© {!YEAR(TODAY())} Honda Canada. 180 Honda Boulevard, Markham, ON, L6C 0H9, 1-888-946-6329
All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
